topic.title: How to Remove the Hazard Symbol

section.title: Remove the Hazard Symbol from the Header
section.p: It is possible to remove the symbol appearing in the hazard header (for example if you consider it redundant with the symbol in the column).

section.title: Remove the Hazard Symbol on the left of the Message Panel
section.p: It is possible to remove the column that contains the hazard symbol (for example, if you want to maximize the message panel).
